title.rendered: Leaders from different industries “Cook for a Smile” at 4th edition in Mumbai

content.rendered:
The 4th edition of Cook for a Smile raised support for providing nutrition to underprivileged children. Presented and hosted by Grand Hyatt Mumbai, in association with Prestige, the initiative brought together eminent personalities from film, TV, and fashion industry with Chef Vikas Khanna to cook, contest and raise support for Smile Foundation children.

Archana Kochhar (Fashion designer), Divya Khosla Kumar (Director/producer, T Series), Manasi Scott (Singer-actress), Shaheen Abbas (Jewellery designer), Nachiket Barve (Fashion designer), Omkar Kapoor (Actor), Vatsal Seth (Actor), Anjolie Ela Menon (Contemporary artist), Kunal Anil Tanna (Fashion designer), Nivedita Saboo (Fashion designer), Kurt Straub (VP, Operations, Hyatt Hotel & Resorts, India), Yasmin Poonegar (Director, Corporate Communication, Hyatt Southwest Asia), Elena Fernandes (Model) and FOX Life India (Media Partner for the event) lent their invaluable support to make the event a success.
